definitions.title: vb. keep
definitions.body: (less common ‖ of [[נׇחַר]]) (NH id.; Targum [[נְטַר]], Syr. nt.ar id.; Nab. in n.pr. Lzb:323 (cf. also infr.), Ar. nat.ara id. (obj. garden, etc.));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1. S. [[נׇטָָרְתִּי]] Ct So 1:6; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִטּוֹר]] Ps 103:9, [[יִנְטוֹר]] Je 3:5; rd. [[וַיִּטּׂר]] also Am 1:11 (for MT [[יִטְרׂף]]) Ol:Ps 103:9 We Now GASm Dr; 2 ms. [[תִּטִּר]] Le 19:18; 1 S. [[אֶטּוֹר]] Je 3:12; Pt. act. [[נוֹטֵר]] Na 1:2; f. [[נׁטֵרָה]] Ct So 1:6; mpl. [[נׁטְרִיס]] Ct So 8:11, So 8:12; —
keep, maintain (sc. wrath), of ´[[י]] Je 3:5, Je 3:12, Na 1:2 (c. [[לֵ]] for), Ps 103:9; of Edom Am 1:11 (rdg. [[וַיִּטּׂר לָעַד אַפּוֹ]] and he kept his anger perpetually, v. supr.).
keep, guard a vineyard Ct So 1:6, So 1:6 (in fig.), abs. So 8:11, obj. [[פִּרְיוֹ]] v:So 8:12.
